notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: RSG, ARS and NMM planned, designed the study and interpreted the results. RSG wrote the manuscript. ARS and NMM revised the manuscript. RSG prepared the inocula and performed the experimental inoculation. RASG, ARS, NMM, MNE, NWA, RVG and MPM sampled and performed the necropsies and laboratory analysis. RASG and MPM performed the immunohistochemistries. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
